Board size | Controls | Options | Export/Import

Controls:

Desktop:
  • Left-click an empty square to reveal it.
  • Right-click an empty square to flag it.
  • Left-click a number to reveal its adjacent squares.
  • Right-click a number to flag its adjacent squares
Mobile:
  • Tap an empty square to reveal it.
  • Long tap an empty square to flag it.
  • Tap a number to reveal its adjacent squares.
  • Long tap a number to flag its adjacent squares

Game grid size:

Height Width Mines
9 9 10
16 16 40
16 30 99

Options:

Long tap duration

Current Value: 250

First tap is safe

Import/Export a game:

Import a game:

Importing will disable "First tap is safe" setting.

Export this game:
